item.description:
Weston Ski Track is a cross-country ski and snowshoeing center located on the Leo J. Martin Golf Course and serving the Greater Boston area. With natural snow, we groom 15km of trails. Snowmaking on our 2km lighted loop provides consistent snow conditions and reliable night skiing. Drop in for a beginner lesson and then warm up in our snack bar.

 

Lessons and rentals are available. We'll plan on meeting at around 9:30. Beginner lessons start at 10:00, and they strongly suggest you reserve online.  They have lots of great information on their website about the different types of XC skiing and lessons on their website at http://skiboston.com/skitrack/skitrack.php. My kids and I aren't taking lessons, so we'll plan on meeting those of you who do at noon for lunch, most likely in the snack bar.  I haven't been there before, so I need to give them a call to determine a good meeting area. 

Hope to see you there!  Here's hoping for more snow!

**This is a joint Meetup with the Boston/Providence Single Parents group
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send my cell number to people who are going, and will post a meeting place after I talk to the people at the venue... I haven't been there before.
item.why: Whether you love it or hate it, the snow is here! So join my kids and I for a day of fun in the snow during February vacation.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Embrace the snow! Cross Country Ski or Snow Shoe-Kid Friendly
